name: Trivial
text: Built a cutting-edge invoice & billing app for FinTech company Trivial.
Designed a beautiful UI for simplified invoice creation and tracking.
Used JavaScript (ES6), Vue 3, Vuex, PrimeVue, and GIT in development.

name: TrendSeam
text: Developed TrendSeam, a Shopify app for e-commerce data visualization.
Challenged myself by working with Remix framework and integrating it with Shopify.
Leveraged Remix, JavaScript (ES6), Polaris UI, and GIT for this project.

name: TSD
text: Redesigned the website for The Site Doctor (TSD), an England-based e-commerce company.
Improved SEO and user experience with Nuxt 3, SCSS, and Figma.
Contributed as a frontend developer from start to finish.

name: Niotix
text: Developed new features and options for an enterprise IoT application.
Worked as a frontend developer using JavaScript (ES6), Vue 2, Vuex & Vue Router, Vuetify, and GIT.

name: Examiz
text: Contributed to the development of Examiz, an HR application with powerful features.
Used JavaScript (ES6), Vue 2, Vuex & Vue Router, and Google Map API in development.

name: AleaBet
text: Developed a dynamic UI and integrated API-driven features for the AleaBet betting platform.
Utilized HTML, CSS, JavaScript & AngularJS, PHP & MySQL, NodeJS, and GIT.

name: AleaBet Lists
text: Developed curated betting lists and insights for the AleaBet platform.
Worked on both web and print versions of the lists for daily/weekly sports events.
Enhanced data presentation and optimized performance.

name: XE
text: This application serves as a demonstration of a main dashboard page, featuring a clean user interface with well-structured graphical elements.
The dashboard presents blockchain statistics and data retrieved from the JSON Bin service.
The application is built with a Node.js API service, while the frontend is developed using Vue.js and PrimeVue for the user interface.

name: Healtcare
text: This application functions as a demonstrative implementation of a primary dashboard interface, characterized by a streamlined user experience and logically organized visual components.
The dashboard environment provides a visualization of healthcare metrics and user-specific data, sourced from structured JSON datasets.
The application is built with HTML/CSS, JavaScript, and JSON data, deployed on Vercel.

name: Keno
text: Implemented game logic and developed responsive interfaces for a lottery-style gambling game platform.
Ensured scalability and a smooth user experience.

name: The Fruits Of The Village
text: Developed a frontend for an application promoting local organic products.
Worked as a frontend developer for the Ministry of Agriculture, Forestry, and Water Management.

name: Pretty Ballerinas
text: Contributed to the development of the Pretty Ballerinas e-commerce website.
Worked as a frontend developer within a team, utilizing PrestaShop for the platform.

name: Mascaro
text: Contributed to the development of the Mascaro e-commerce website.
Worked as a frontend developer within a team, utilizing PrestaShop for the platform.

name: RHMZRS
text: Integrated Google Maps with hydrometeorological, seismic, and air quality data for the RHMZRS website.
Gained extensive experience with the Google Maps API.

name: Nikom
text: Created a presentational website for Nikom, a CNC company, using WordPress CMS.
Gained valuable experience with WordPress and its functionalities.

name: OOMovers
text: Worked as a full-stack developer on the OOMovers website and transportation management system.
Handled a variety of tasks, including frontend and backend development.

name: Goran Radmanovic
text: Created a personal portfolio website with plain HTML, CSS, and JavaScript.
Implemented PWA options with native Service Workers for enhanced user experience.

name: Jatheon Cloud
text: Built a dynamic table app with VueJS to manipulate data.
Enhanced user interaction with features for adding, removing, and editing data within the table.

name: Stealio
text: Developed a coupon system for Amazon purchases as part of the Stealio project for Helium10 (USA).
Contributed to both frontend and backend development, utilizing HTML, CSS, JavaScript, jQuery, PHP, and Yii Framework.

name: Einfo
text: Interned at E-info, a Bosnian IT company specializing in large databases.
Gained experience with MSSQL servers and SQL language. Built a presentation website to showcase my learnings.

name: B2B Platform
text: Maintained the frontend of a B2B platform connecting German dairy producers and buyers for KompITenz GmbH (Germany/Bosnia and Herzegovina).
Utilized HTML, CSS, JavaScript (ES6), jQuery, SASS, PHP & MySQL, Laravel & VueJS, and GIT.

name: Old Portfolio
text: Early portfolio website showcasing my initial web development projects.

name: Air Quality
text: Built an air quality monitoring application for my hometown to inform residents during winter.

name: Mondrian
text: Recreated two Mondrian art pieces using HTML, CSS (especially CSS grid), showcasing the intersection of art and programming.

name: Chatty
text: Developed a simple real-time chat application using VueJS and Firebase to experiment with these technologies.

name: Bplace
text: This project was the culmination of my advanced PHP & MySQL course.
My primary objective was to develop a custom Content Management System (CMS) with an administrative panel and a user-facing frontend.
The entire project was built using primarily PHP, MySQL, and a minimal amount of JavaScript.
